summary: Successfully completed 3 commits. Committed 3 file change(s)

commits.message:
chore(kcmt): update execution stats in last run log

Updated timestamp, duration_seconds, rate_commits_per_sec, commit_hash,
message, elapsed, and rate in the JSON log to reflect the latest kcmt
execution. This ensures accurate performance tracking and metadata for
debugging purposes.

feat(cli): Add auto-installation of Ink UI dependencies

Modify the dependency check method to attempt one-time auto-installation
of Node.js modules for Ink UI when Node is present but dependencies are
missing. This simplifies setup by making `pip install` sufficient for
Python dependencies while lazily preparing the TUI. Respects opt-out via
KCMT_AUTO_INSTALL_INK_DEPS=0/false and skips installation during tests.
Supports npm, pnpm, and yarn with fallback commands for peer dependency
issues. Re-probes after successful installation to confirm readiness.

subjects: chore(kcmt): update execution stats in last run log
feat(cli): Add auto-installation of Ink UI dependencies
